title: Maintenance and sharpening of power saw chains
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Electric apparatus and appliances - Safety measures
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Electric apparatus and appliances - Safety measures
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Tools - Safety measures
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Tools - Safety measures
Mathematics, Science & Technology/Electric apparatus and appliances - Safety measures
description: Unsatisfactory performance and service of power saw chains is usually due to inadequate maintenance. Shows three basic rules for maintenance: check chain tension; check oiling system and use only correct oil; regularly "touch up" chain cutting teeth with file without removing from saw.
